article:
In medicine, a 'deficiency' is a lack or shortage of a functional entity, by
less than normal or necessary supply or function. [http://medical-
dictionary.thefreedictionary.com/deficiency TheFreeDictionary > deficiency].
Citing: *Dorland's Medical Dictionary for Health Consumers. Â© 2007 *Miller-Keane
Encyclopedia and Dictionary of Medicine, Nursing, and Allied Health, Seventh
Edition. Â© 2003
